meanings.definition: A diagnostic test that uses X-rays to take pictures of blood vessels in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended angiograms to check the blood vessels in my heart.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used angiograms to examine the blood vessels in the patient's brain.
meanings.sent3: During the angiograms, the X-ray machine seemed to be taking pictures of tiny rivers inside the body.
meanings.sent4: The angiograms revealed a roadmap of veins and arteries, like a hidden treasure map.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the angiograms made it easy to see the blood vessels clearly.

meanings.definition: The images produced by an angiogram.
meanings.sent1: The angiograms displayed detailed pictures of the blood vessels in the leg.
meanings.sent2: The doctor studied the angiograms carefully to understand the patient's condition.
meanings.sent3: The angiograms looked like colorful mazes of blood vessels on the screen.
meanings.sent4: The angiograms were like snapshots capturing the flow of blood through the body.
meanings.sent5: The clarity of the angiograms made it easy to see the blood vessels clearly.
